description: Emergent Gravity-specialized branch of the collider framework, integrating Kastner-Schlatter's 2025 Thermodynamic Gravity as physics substrate. Focuses on entropic emergence from quantum transactions, dark matter as gradients, and near-term galactic/CMB tests. Maintains shared core for v1.6 compatibility.

manifold.formula: M (Riemannian with Fisher metric g_ij = E[∂_i log p · ∂_j log p])
manifold.notes: Belief space; integrates emergent compactness via transactional flows.

path_integral.name: Z
path_integral.notes: Unifier; emergence via entropic averages, no fundamental gravity.

action.notes: QED action with thermodynamic entropy term; gravity as emergent output.

free_energy.notes: Core; derives gravity as entropy maximization.

integrated_equation.formula: dξ/dt = -∇_g F - λ_eff ∇_g ρ + ∇ · J_S + κ Φ(ρ)
integrated_equation.notes: Dynamics over emergent substrate; conatus from transactional entropy.

physics_substrate.emergent_gravity: Thermodynamic emergence by Kastner-Schlatter (2025); no gravitons; dark matter as gradients; matches GR via averaging.
physics_substrate.unifier: Z with transactional QED; bounds gaps <1%.

galactic_rotation.path: Derives flat curves from thermodynamic gradients; SymPy verified.

phases.phase_1: Emergent module integration; rotation curve pipeline.

metadata.synthesis: Evolves from v1.5B; tool-verified via journal searches.
